Description:
IN/SPD280222/01-312312066
You have failed to make and give effect to appropriate arrangements for the effective planning, organisation, control, monitoring and review of the preventive and protective measures required to prevent persons being exposed to risk due to accidental start-up during machine interventions on the Hamuel Reichenbacher CNC machining centre and Hundegger Speedcut SC-1 saw in that; you have failed to establish specific isolation procedures for these machines and you have failed to establish appropriate arrangements to monitor and review the methods of isolation that are being applied in practice. 

IN/SPD280222/02-312312213
You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to wood dust, which is a substance 
hazardous to health is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled in that; you have failed to establish appropriate work processes and provide suitable work equipment for cleaning activities and, as a consequence, dry sweeping is being used to clear wood dust and, you have failed to provide suitable respiratory protective equipment (RPE) for tasks such as changing dust extraction bags.
